definition: to nibble away at sth/to eat into/to erode
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: The bed of a river is partly worn away by corrosive action.
sentences.chinese: 河牀部分地就是被這種侵蝕作用沖蝕的。

sentences.english: Fourthly, the simulation takes no account of the effects of coastal erosion.
sentences.chinese: 第四，模擬過程沒有考慮到海岸侵蝕作用的影響。

sentences.english: The solution has some erosion to the skin.
sentences.chinese: 其水溶液對皮膚有一定的侵蝕作用。

sentences.english: Chemical weathering was beginning to attack the unweathered bedrock.
sentences.chinese: 化學侵蝕作用開始攻擊還未侵蝕的岩牀。

sentences.english: Erosion has dissolved acres of topsoil.
sentences.chinese: 侵蝕作用已使大量表土層流失。

sentences.english: We know that erosion occurs in response to the monsoon today.
sentences.chinese: 目前我們知道季風會影響侵蝕作用。
